Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 we praise your righteousness o god holy judge of earth and heaven forever just and without flaw only doing what is right in your kindness and your mercy youve revealed to us your law we praise your righteousness o god verse 2 we see your righteousness o god in the keeping of your promise your saving grace displayed to all to restore a world gone wrong as the threats of hell are silenced by the cry upon the cross we see your righteousness o god bridge lord you are just and you justify all who trust in the blood of christ verse 3 we love your righteousness o god you have owned us as your children your gift to those that you have called through no merits of our own and by faith we stand forgiven joined to jesus christ our all we love your righteousness we see your righteousness we praise your righteousness o god
